description:
Frieza reveals a dark secret from Vegeta’s past, but the villain has an even more shocking secret in store for the Z-fighters! As the monster’s power level rises to terrifying new heights, all hope for the universe seems lost!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu no Chou Henshin!! Sentou Ryoku 100-man no Freezer
Um pesadelo de transformação! Freeza possui o poder de um milhão
การแปลงร่างแห่งฝันร้าย!! พลังของฟรีสเซอร์ทะลุ 1 ล้าน!
悪夢の超変身!! 戦闘力100万のフリーザ
